document_data.name: Nym
document_data.mainbody: '''Nym''' was the aged [[drow]] proprietor of the [[Jewel Box]] tavern in [[Menzoberranzan]] in the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Activities: He was a retired battle [[wizard]] and at some point in his past lost one of his legs and didn't get it magically replaced. It was suspected that he paid a large amount of his profits to the Ruling Council of the city in order for the more blasphemous of the seedier elements of his business to be allowed to passâ€”keeping female drow slaves for prostitution.
